item.description:
Hey all! We usually meet up on the 3rd Tuesday of the month, but lately we've been trying some new things to mix it up.

Some of us are planning to hang out at the Red Hat for food/drinks on Saturday, and we thought we'd make it a meetup. The upstairs section of the Red Hat is not usually very crowded on the weekends, so it's a great place for us to meet up and hang out. Come for dinner, drinks, or just the conversation!

Find us in the BACK section of the UPSTAIRS area.

We'll be there at 6:30, but come whenever you can -- I'm sure we'll be there for a few hours.

Hope you can make it! Feel free to bring friends!

... The Boston Republican Meetup Group holds social events to give us MA Republicans/Conservatives/Libertarians/etc an opportunity to meet one another. The recent crowds have included a great mix of long-time members and first-time attendees, men and women of all ages!

First timers are always welcome! Feel free to walk right in and introduce yourself.

Worried about how to find us? The place is not usually too crowded and we'll meet in the BACK section UPSTAIRS.

Most economical parking would be at meters, but there's also the Center Plaza Garage, the Government Center Garage, and the Boston Common Garage for 10-12 bucks.
item.name: Weekend Meetup at the Red Hat
